description: Episode of Series "Marketing in Practice". Outlines the steps to adopt when dealing with complaints. 1. Listen. 2. Sympathize. 3. Don't justify or apportion blame. 4. Diagnose - acquire more information by asking questions. 5. Remedy - agree upon a course of action. 6. Follow through the course of action to completion. Cast include John Cleese, Una Stubbs, Ian Ogilivy and George A. Cooper. FOR USE ONLY IN A DOMESTIC SITUATION OR FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY.
